title: Panicked from calling `Option::unwrap()` in compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/def_path_hash_map.rs:18:85

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code This happened while running `cargo t` against the code in https://github.com/djc/epp-client/tree/available-ice. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.58.1 (db9d1b20b 2022-01-20) binary: rustc commit-hash: db9d1b20bba1968c1ec1fc49616d4742c1725b4b commit-date: 2022-01-20 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.58.1 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/def_path_hash_map.rs:18:85 note: rustc 1.58.1 (db9d1b20b 2022-01-20) running on aarch64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `client` #1 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::panicking::panic 3: ::def_path_hash_to_def_id 4: ::def_path_hash_to_def_id 5: as rustc_middle::dep_graph::dep_node::DepNodeExt>::extract_def_id 6: rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::adt_def::force_from_dep_node 7: ::try_force_from_dep_node 8: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 9: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 10: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 11: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 12: >::try_mark_green:: 13: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory:: 14: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 15: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 16: ::instance_mir 17: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_neighbours 18: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 19: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 20: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 21: ::time::<(), rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items::{closure#1}> 22: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items 23: rustc_monomorphize::partitioning::collect_and_partition_mono_items 24: >::with_task::>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])> 25: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<((&std::collections::hash::set::HashSet>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit]), rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])>::{closure#3}> 26: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])>> 27: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 28: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate:: 29: ::codegen_crate 30: ::ongoing_codegen 31: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 32: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 33: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> ```
